name: ThePackedMan
description:
[epilepsy warning] - this game has a lot of "flashing" going on in it. 

i don't have a clue if the linux version works or not, if you're a linux user and you've downloaded the game and it doesn't work, first of all I'm sorry for causing you're internet to go to waste, second of all. please tell me so i can remove it from the downloads <3

__________________________________________________________________________

so, this is a horror game inspired by the old game that we all know, pac man . and this, originally was made for the dream arcade archive game jam, but i took it further

(if you want to play the jam release, then do it lol)

, the map is the same. the gameplay is the same. i improved the graphics a lot, and as a result it might be less performance friendly, but hey you cant adjust the screen size to get around it. improved the enemy ai, mini map , and etc...

also added another enemy with a whole different mechanism + a few fun power ups that can be found. 

__________

huge thanks to Cameron Koblinski and CrazyCheesePuf for playing and uploading their gameplays in youtube, thanks to them i could realize the game's shortcomings and improve it in many different ways.

--------------

personally i think the jam version of the game was too easy, I mean once you knew which each and every cherry was you could beat the whole game in less than 3 minutes .so I made it a bit more challenging, and ofcourse in return. i added a few abilities that you can gain through out the game to make your job easier.

--------------

i never intended to take this game this seriously, i thought it would be just a small and nice second project that i could get away with:P but thankfully i was able to spend more time on it , i'm not saying that this is the perfect game now, but i'd say its way better than the jam release.

_____[if you just want to play the game you can skip to the downloads now]__________

read this if you're a developer who wants to use the game's resource

just life before the resource for the game is completely accessible through the file that you're downloading. and you're free to use anything in it as long as you don't claim that you made it. also needless to say, don't sell what's free. only if it's mixed with your own work you can use it commercially . 

and most importantly , DON'T LAUGH AT MY CODE, if you think that anything code related in the game could be done better, you can be a nice person and just tell me about it , ^-^ and i'd be grateful .

if you want to know about the development, here's the tools i used:

blender -> for anything 3d

krita ->for anything 2d

audacity and Lmms --> sounds

and finally, godot -> the amazing game engine that let me put all the parts together and make this game possible

bye:O (if you're feeling extra supportive, here's my YTChannel)
